title: #WALKAWAY
author: VD
content_html: It’s really encouraging to see how even liberal reporters like Amanda Robb of Rolling Stone and National Public Radio have come around to endorsing the God-Emperor and making America great again. But what, no American flag bikini? Amanda, where is your patriotism?
content_text:
It’s really encouraging to see how even liberal reporters like Amanda Robb of
Rolling Stone
and
National Public Radio
have come around to
endorsing the God-Emperor and making America great again. But what, no American flag bikini? Amanda, where is your patriotism?
